definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: barefoot, alw. abs. [[יׇחֵף]] Is 20:2 + 4 t.;—[[הלך עָרוֹם וְיׇחֵף]] Is 20:2 ([[רַגְּלֶָ ְנַעַלְ ְתַחֲלֽץ מֵעַל]] in preceding cl.), v:Is 20:3; [[הׂלֵח יׇחֵף]] 2Sa 15:30; [[נׇהַג יׇחֵף]] Is 20:3; appar. = subst., [[מִנְעִי רַגְלֵח מִיׇּחֵף]] Je 2:25 withhold thy foot from bareness (Syr. yuwh.opo0 discalceatio).
